== MythGame ==
MythGame is a front-end interface to launch PC games and emulators from MythTV.  You will need the game files, emulators, ROMs, etc. in order to use MythGame- '''''no game files are included'''''.

=== Install MythGame ===

<pre>
$ sudo apt-get install mythgame
</pre>
